name.baseName: Farmland remediation ; In-situ remediation ; Solidification/stabilization ; End-of disposal ; Sample testing
农田修复;原位修复;钝化修复;后端处置;样品检测

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The process described is for the remediation of farmland soil contaminated by lead-zinc mining in Nujiang Prefecture, Yunnan Province. It covers an area of 16 hectares and utilizes stabilization techniques during the end-of-pipe disposal stage to ensure that concentrations of Cd and Pb in crops meet required standards and that the bioavailable concentrations of Cd and Pb in the soil are reduced by over 70%. The process involves in-situ and solidification/stabilization remediation methods, followed by sample testing using Flame Atomic Absorption Spectrophotometry to validate the remediation effectiveness.
稳定化修复的后端处置阶段，采用火焰原子吸收光谱法进行样品检测。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: 云南省怒江州受铅锌矿污染某耕地土壤 污染修复工程

technology.technologicalApplicability: The process described is for the remediation of farmland soil contaminated by lead-zinc mining in Nujiang Prefecture, Yunnan Province. It covers an area of 16 hectares and utilizes stabilization techniques during the end-of-pipe disposal stage to ensure that concentrations of Cd and Pb in crops meet required standards and that the bioavailable concentrations of Cd and Pb in the soil are reduced by over 70%. The process involves in-situ and solidification/stabilization remediation methods, followed by sample testing using Flame Atomic Absorption Spectrophotometry to validate the remediation effectiveness.
该工程过程适用于云南省怒江州铅锌矿污染耕地土壤的修复。覆盖面积为16公顷，使用稳定化技术在后端处置阶段确保作物中Cd和Pb浓度符合标准要求，并且土壤中有效态Cd和Pb浓度降低超过70%。过程包括原位修复和固化/稳定化修复方法，并通过火焰原子吸收光谱法对样品进行测试，以验证修复的有效性。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 肖萌 et al. 农田污染钝化修复环境影响定量评估方法与案例分析. 中国环境科学 43, 3571–3581 (2023).
肖萌 et al. 农田污染钝化修复环境影响定量评估方法与案例分析. 中国环境科学 43, 3571–3581 (2023).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Data set users should note that the remediation process covered by this data is tailored for heavy metal-contaminated farmland specific to conditions found in lead-zinc mining areas of Yunnan Province. The applied stabilization technology should be contextualized within the regional parameters, crop types, and contamination levels. Users need to adjust the procedural details and outcome expectations when applying this data set to different regions or contamination scenarios. Additionally, the validity of the remediation should be certified through the use of Flame Atomic Absorption Spectrophotometry as documented in the process, ensuring compliance with the Cd and Pb concentration standards in both crops and soil.
数据集使用者需注意，此数据覆盖的修复过程特别适应于云南省铅锌矿区重金属污染的农田条件。所应用的稳定化技术应该根据区域参数、作物类型和污染水平进行具体分析。用户在将此数据集应用到不同地区或污染场景时，需要调整程序细节和预期成果。另外，修复的有效性应该通过文档中记录的火焰原子吸收光谱法进行验证，确保作物和土壤中Cd和Pb浓度符合标准。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
